desc: Increases spell cast range by 220. The spell damage bonus from Aether Lens (5%) is equivalent to the amount provided by 80
notes:
Cast range bonuses of multiple Aether Lenses do not stack.
The cast range bonus only affects ability and item cast ranges. It does not affect the radius of any spell.
Some spells which affect a line or an area in front of the caster, have their reach increased as well (with some exceptions).
lore: Polished with the incantation of his final breath, the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.
